entry.title: Method v1.3.4 Released
entry.summary: Method and Method Generator v1.3.4 are now available. This release adds support for easily adding new format tags without the need to edit Method's layout class directly, adds support for adding layout class documentation to the admin dialog using a new action, and adds optional $fallback arguments to the getmeta()), getloadedmeta()), and getoption()) methods.

entry.title: And We're Live
entry.summary: After greatly underestimating the number of pages that would be needed to adequately document Method and Method Generator, the documentation site is finally live! Currently, there are a number of missing items, inconsistencies in format, etc, but this should be enough to gain a sound understanding of how the project works and more importantly, how to get up and running. Check back over the next few weeks for frequent updates, as now that this thing is live, I can begin the process of frantically editing all the content.
